UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Anti-microbial properties of histone H2A from skin secretions of rainbow trout, Oncorhynchus mykiss.
Literature.Author: Fernandes JM, Kemp GD, Molle MG, Smith VJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aerococcus viridans NCIMB 1120(IC50=0.08-0.15µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(IC50=0.6-1.2µM),Micrococcus luteus NCIMB 376(IC50=0.6-1.2µM),Planococcus citreus NCIMB 1493(IC50=0.08-0.15µM),Renibacterium salmoninarum NCIMB 1114(IC50=0.15-0.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCIMB 6571(IC50=>1.2µM),Aeromonas hydrophila NCIMB 1134(IC50=>1.2µM),Aeromonas salmonicida MT004(IC50=>1.2µM),Aeromonas salmonicida MT849(IC50=>1.2µM),Escherichia coli NCIMB 12210(IC50=>1.2µM),Vibrio anguillarum NCIMB 2129(IC50=>1.2µM),Vibrio anguillarum 01 MT1637(IC50=>1.2µM),Yersinia ruckeri MT252(IC50=>1.2µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(IC50=0.3-0.6µM)
